Package babble.net.json

Asynchrnous JSON-RPC protocol.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ProxyContext
    An execution context for a proxy.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EchoRoute  
    JSONRequest
    A JSON-RPC request.
    JSONResponse  
    JSONRoute
    A route to be executed.
    JSONRPC  
    JSONRPCClient
    A Client using JSON-RPC protocol.
    JSONRPCRouter  
    JSONRPCServer
    A server using TCP/IP as transport and JSON-RPC as application protocol.

Package babble.net.json Description

Asynchrnous JSON-RPC protocol. Communicates via JSONRequest and JSONResponse that are compliant to JSON-RPC specification
